Антон Коваленко — эксперт с 20-летним опытом в IT, архитектор масштабных инфраструктур и приложений. Senior Solutions Architect в Amazon Web Services.

региональный менеджер AWS в Казахстане и СНГ.

IT sohasidagi xotin-qizlar uchun "Yulduz Tech Awards" mukofotlash marosimi
Xotin-qizlarning IT sohasidagi roli yildan-yilga ortib, ular innovatsion yechimlar yaratuvchilari, texnologik loyihalar yetakchilari va raqamli o'zgarishlarning muhim ishtirokchilariga aylanmoqda.
IT sohasida faoliyat yuritayotgan xotin-qizlarning mehnatiga munosib baho berish, ularni rag'batlantirish, ularning yutuqlarini keng jamoatchilikka tanishtirish maqsadida Raqamli texnologiyalar vazirligi tomonidan ilk bor "Yulduz Tech Awards" mukofoti marosimi bo'lib o'tadi.
Ushbu tadbir ayollarning IT sohasida yangi marralarni zabt etishiga ilhom beradi va ularning jamiyatdagi o'rni hamda ta'sirini yanada mustahkamlashga xizmat qiladi.
Shuningdek, tadbir davomida ishtirokchilar uchun qiziqarli IT QUIZ o'tkazilib, g'oliblarga esdalik sovg'alari topshiriladi. QUIZ'da qatnashishni istaganlar quyidagi havola orqali ro'yxatdan o'tishlari so'raladi: <URL>

Join the #IAmRemarkable Workshop with Julia Sevruk on December 22 at 14:00!
#IAmRemarkable is a global initiative designed to help individuals recognize their worth, celebrate their accomplishments, and break free from societal norms that hold them back. It's all about fostering self-belief and confidence in your unique journey.
Why should you join?
This FREE workshop, open to all genders, is for anyone who wants to feel more confident in self-promotion. Together, we'll learn how to proudly share our achievements, celebrate success, and embrace our worth.
During this 90-minute workshop, we will:
• Reflect on our own limiting beliefs about self-promotion
• Review data and research on self-promotion and bias
• Complete a main exercise to help you identify and share your achievements
• Wrap up with discussion and take-home exercises
About the facilitator: Julia Sevruk
• Originally from Andijan, Uzbekistan
• Project Manager at Yandex
• Certified #IAmRemarkable Facilitator
• Community Lead at Women in Tech Uzbekistan
Event Details:
• Date: 22nd December, 14:00 Tashkent time
• Language: Russian
• Format: Online (Zoom)
Register here: <URL> (<URL>)
Don't miss this chance to work on your self-promotion skills. It might just be one of the best things you can do for yourself before the New Year!
—

Узнали, как узбекистанец строит стартап в США и что думает о стартап-экосистемах Узбекистана и США.
Камрон Ходжаев, город — Нью-Йорк, co-founder, GTM lead
Рынок США большой, и в зависимости от типа стартапа возникают свои сложности, но и открываются большие возможности. Покупательская способность как у людей, так и у компаний в B2B значительно выше, но конкуренция здесь также высокая. Конкуренция на рынке США помогает быстрее выявить сильные и слабые стороны стартапа.
Подробнее читайте в нашем материале по ссылке. (<URL>)
Больше на @thetechkz

Как самооценка влияет на результаты бизнеса?
Внутренняя фундаментальность — это ключ к адаптации в условиях постоянных изменений в предпринимательстве. Самооценка основателя играет решающую роль в формировании общей картины бизнеса.
Не пропустите наш вебинар от Tumaris.Tech в сотрудничестве с IT Park и Проектом USAID по развитию предпринимательской среды!
Наш спикер, Мария Пронина — CEO «Antigravity Group», партнер по soft skills в бизнес-акселераторе TheQube.UZ и бизнес-психолог, поделится с вами важными аспектами внутренней устойчивости и ее влиянием на ведение бизнеса.
На вебинаре вы получите ответы на актуальные вопросы:
• Что влияет на самооценку?
• Как формируется самооценка и что делать, если она низкая?
• Как негативные последствия низкой самооценки проявляются в личной жизни и бизнесе?
• Как здоровое отношение к себе способствует укреплению бизнес-процессов и повышению эффективности?

Время: 18:00 (GMT+5)
Ссылка для регистрации (<URL>)

The next Women in Tech Talks, focusing on cybersecurity, will be hosted at the Group-IB office!
Curious about cybersecurity? We've got experts ready to share their knowledge! Group-IB (<URL>) is a global leader in fighting cybercrime—they help organizations detect and defend against cyber threats. With more than 1,550 successful investigations across 60+ countries, they're the top professionals for incident response.
Don't miss this inspiring talk—it could be your next (or first) step toward an impactful career!
Event Agenda:
- Coffee break and office tour – explore Group IB's workspace
- Welcome remarks from Anna Ambrozevich, Women in Tech Uzbekistan director
- Personal career stories from Group IB's leading women
Speakers:
Saniya Mirzagulova – Junior Analyst at Group IB. Saniya will talk about her inspiring transition from teaching to becoming a cybersecurity analyst.
Veronika Kolobova – Head of Business Application Development & Support Department. Veronika will explore non-technical roles in IT companies and share tips on building a career without a tech background.
Anastasiya Timoshina – Cyber Fraud Analyst. Anastasiya will discuss her path into the IT field and the obstacles she overcame along the way.
Darya Rodina – Senior Talent Acquisition Manager at Group IB. Darya will provide actionable advice on starting a career in IT and landing your dream role.
No doubts, the Talks format has already proven itself to be a fantastic way to connect. We've received incredible feedback that this is one of the most valuable opportunities to hear real-life stories and ask questions in a safe, welcoming space with company representatives.

IT Park Mahalliy startuplar uchun yangi istiqbollar va imkoniyatlarni kengaytirib, Saudiya Arabistonida yangi filial ochmoqda!
Hurmatli Startap egalari! Mamnuniyat bilan ma'lum qilamizki, IT Park o'z geografiya chegaralarini kengaytirib, Saudiya Arabistonida o'zining yangi filialini ochmoqda!
Bu Sizga quyidagi imkoniyatlarni taqdim etadi:
Saudiya Arabistoni bozoriga chiqish – bu IT xizmatlar va mahsulotlarga katta talabga ega bo'lgan bozor.
Hududning eng dinamik bozorlaridan birida o'z xizmat va mahsulotlaringizni taklif qilish imkoniyati.
O'zbekistonning IT kompaniyalari imiji va brendini xalqaro miqyosda mustahkamlash.
Sizlarni 2024 yilning 16 dekabrida Saudiya Arabistonida o'tkaziladigan rasmiy ochilish marosimida ishtirok etishga taklif qilib qolamiz.
Rasmiy ochilish marosimi Raqamli texnologiyalar vaziri va IT Park Bosh direktori boshchiligida bo'lib o'tadi.
Viza masalalari va boshqa savollar bo'yicha quyidagi raqamga murojaat qilishingiz mumkin: +998 99 859 13 80 Dildora Nasibullayeva
